body.title: NightlyJS
body.body:
A contextual framework
Focused on simplicity and reusability
Discover components as functions
Create web apps with barely no additional footprints

body.title: Think outside the box, think about the context.
Why the contextual approach ?
body.body: The best way to think outside the box is to know in which context the box is in.

body.title: Context based decisions.
body.body:
NightlyJS allows you to make easier context based decisions or programming.
e.g. Let's say you have multiple forms and you want to access one field in each one of them. Because NightlyJS functions returns the context of the elements it creates, you can access those elements through their context or save it in a variable for later use.

body.title: No footprints
body.body: NightlyJS is designed to be a non-invasive framework as it comes with zero dependencies and is entirely based on the standard DOM API.
